headline: ServiceNow AI Partnerships Test Workflow Role As Stock Weakness Persists
summary: ServiceNow is deepening its generative AI push through expanded partnerships with Anthropic and OpenAI, bringing new AI driven workflow tools to enterprise customers. The company is rolling out these capabilities across its own organization, including broad internal use of Claude, to refine and stress test AI features on its platform. New agreements, such as an expanded contract with Panasonic Avionics, highlight growing adoption of ServiceNow's AI centric workflow solutions in customer...

headline: 1 of Wall Street’s Favorite Stock on Our Buy List and 2 We Find Risky
summary: The stocks in this article have caught Wall Street’s attention in a big way, with price targets implying returns above 20%. But investors should take these forecasts with a grain of salt because analysts typically say nice things about companies so their firms can win business in other product lines like M&A advisory.

headline: Salesforce Employees Demand CEO Marc Benioff Cut Ties With ICE After Controversial Joke Sparks Backlash: Report
summary: Employees at Salesforce.com Inc (NYSE: CRM) are urging CEO Marc Benioff to publicly condemn the recent actions of the U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE), while also calling for the prohibition of Salesforce software by immigration agents and support for federal legislation to reform the agency.
